Name: Light Fighter
About the game: You need to defend yourself from enemies approaching from all sides. You are in the center of the screen and swing your sword, with a mouse click you change the side of the swing. The more enemies you hit with your sword, the more points you collect. Over time, the pace of the game accelerates and you have to try not to lose.
